zujkomiller.genetic
Interface EvolutionObserver

All Known Implementing Classes:
Genie
public interface EvolutionObserver

Classes implementing this interface, EvolutionObserver, may register themselves with classes which implement EvolutionObservable so that they will be notified when new generations are created and tested for fitness.

Method Summary
 void generationCreated(Generation generation, int topScoreSoFar, boolean isLastGeneration, EvolutionObservable observable)
          This method is called by an EvolutionObservable when a new generations has been created and tested for fitness.
 

Method Detail

generationCreated

public void generationCreated(Generation generation,
                              int topScoreSoFar,
                              boolean isLastGeneration,
                              EvolutionObservable observable)
This method is called by an EvolutionObservable when a new generations has been created and tested for fitness.
Parameters:
generation - The generation that was just created.
generationNumber - The number of the generation (ex: if this is the second generation created, the generationNumber will be 2).
topScoreSoFar - The top score achieved so far by any Chromosome in any generation.
isLastGeneration - This will be true only when no other generations will be created after the one passed in as a param.
observable - The EvoluitonObservable object which called this method. It can be queried for more information.
